questions.question: Do you have any history of chronic diseases, such as diabetes, hypertension, or cardiovascular diseases?
Are you currently taking any prescription medications?
Have you ever had an allergic reaction to any medications?
questions.answer: Yes, I am allergic to penicillin.

questions.question: Do you smoke tobacco or use any nicotine products?
Do you regularly exercise or engage in physical activity?
questions.answer: Yes, I walk for 30 minutes every day.

questions.question: Do you have a family history of cancer?
questions.answer: Yes, my mother had breast cancer.

questions.question: Have you ever been hospitalized for any reason?
questions.answer: Yes, I was hospitalized for surgery in 2019.

questions.question: Do you have any known food allergies?
Do you experience any frequent or chronic headaches?
Do you have any problems with your vision, such as blurred vision or eye strain?
questions.answer: Occasionally, I experience eye strain after long periods of screen use.
